name: The Hallow
summary_text: A family who moved into a remote mill house in Ireland finds themselves in a fight for survival with demonic creatures living in the woods.

name: Mister Roberts
summary_text: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

name: Sergeant York
summary_text: A marksman is drafted in World War I and ends up becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

name: Swing Kids
summary_text: A group of teens adores forbidden music in Nazi Germany just before the outbreak of World War II.

name: Raid
summary_text: A fearless income tax officer raids the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow after someone mysteriously draws his attention towards the evidence.

name: American Pastoral
summary_text: An All-American college star and his beauty queen wife watch their seemingly perfect life fall apart as their daughter joins the turmoil of '60s America.

name: A Dog's Way Home
summary_text: A female dog travels four hundred miles in search of her owner throughout a Colorado wilderness.

name: Big Bad Wolves
summary_text: After a little girl is brutally murdered, a suspect avoids arrest due to lack of evidence. Working separately, her father and a cop decide to do something about it.

name: Village of the Damned
summary_text: In the English village of Midwich, the blonde-haired, glowing-eyed children of uncertain paternity prove to have frightening powers.

name: Hamlet
summary_text: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.

name: Freedomland
summary_text: A black police detective must solve a strange case of a kidnapped boy and deal with a big racial protest.

name: Time After Time
summary_text: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

name: Now, Voyager
summary_text: A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.

name: Iron Monkey
summary_text: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin monk takes over the authorities.

name: Opera
summary_text: A young opperata is stalked by a deranged fan bent on killing the people associated with her to claim her for himself.

name: Assassination of a High School President
summary_text: At a Catholic high school, a sophomore newspaper reporter investigates a case of stolen SAT exams. He thinks he's nailed the suspect and managed to get the popular girl when he realises a larger conspiracy is afoot.

name: Jin-Roh: The Wolf Brigade
summary_text: A traumatized member of an elite para-military police force falls for the sister of a female terrorist courier who died in front of him on duty.

name: Great Balls of Fire!
summary_text: The life and career of wildly controversial rock 'n' roll star Jerry Lee Lewis.

name: Chhalaang
summary_text: Chhalaang is a hilarious, yet inspirational journey of Montu, a PT Master from a semi govt. funded school for whom teaching PT is just a job. When circumstances put everything he cares for ...                See full summary »

name: Tess
summary_text: A strong-willed young peasant girl attracts the affection of two men.

name: Gods and Generals
summary_text: The rise and fall of confederate general Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, as he meets with military success against the Union from 1861 to 1863, when he is accidentally killed by his own soldiers.

name: The Onion Movie
summary_text: Satirical interpretations of world events and curious human behavior.

name: When the Game Stands Tall
summary_text: The journey of legendary football coach Bob Ladouceur, who took the De La Salle High School Spartans from obscurity to a 151-game winning streak that shattered all records for any American sport.

name: The Dish
summary_text: A remote Australian community, populated by quirky characters, plays a key role in the first Apollo moon landing.

name: Convoy
summary_text: Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

name: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
summary_text: Instead of coming in from the Cold War, British agent Alec Leamas chooses to face another mission.

name: College Road Trip
summary_text: When an overachieving high school student decides to travel around the country to choose the perfect college, her overprotective cop father decides to accompany her to keep her on the straight and narrow.

name: The Cranes Are Flying
summary_text: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

name: Toc Toc
summary_text: The adventures and misadventures of a group of patients with OCD appointed at the same time.

name: The Joy Luck Club
summary_text: The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

name: The Lizard
summary_text: A recently jailed petty thief disguises as a Mullah and succeeds in escaping; but has to stay in the Mullah' role longer than he expected to.

name: Hell Ride
summary_text: Two rival bikers gangs, the Victors and the Six-Six-Six's, refuel their decades-old rivalry.

name: Shahid
summary_text: The account of Human Rights lawyer Shahid Azmi, an ordinary citizen with an extraordinary commitment to justice.

name: Cocoon: The Return
summary_text: The seniors return to Earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on Earth?

name: What's in a Name?
summary_text: Vincent is about to become a father. At a meeting with childhood friends he announces the name for his future son. The scandalous name ignites a discussion which surfaces unpleasant matters from the past of the group.

name: Atlantic City
summary_text: In a corrupt city, a small-time gangster and the estranged wife of a pot dealer find themselves thrown together in an escapade of love, money, drugs and danger.

name: White God
summary_text: Thirteen-year-old Lili fights to protect her dog Hagen. She is devastated when her father eventually sets Hagen free on the streets. Still innocently believing love can conquer any difficulty, Lili sets out to find her dog and save him.

name: Alex Strangelove
summary_text: Alex, high school class president, nerd and a straight A student, has been dating Claire a long time. They decide to sleep together but then he meets a gay guy and he's confused.

name: The Cincinnati Kid
summary_text: An up-and-coming poker player tries to prove himself in a high-stakes match against a long-time master of the game.

name: Dil Dhadakne Do
summary_text: The Mehra family must contemplate over their way of living and their love lives while on a cruise celebrating their 30th wedding anniversary.

name: Saint Maud
summary_text: Follows a pious nurse who becomes dangerously obsessed with saving the soul of her dying patient.

name: Project A
summary_text: Fighting against pirates at the turn of the 20th century, the Hong Kong navy are failing miserably. It's up to Sergeant Lung (Jackie Chan) to take matters into his own hands.

name: Warlock
summary_text: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.
A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

name: High Sierra
summary_text: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

name: Band Baaja Baaraat
summary_text: Shruti and Bittoo become partners in their very own "Wedding planning ka bijness" in Delhi and in the process discover friendship, love and one another.

name: Who's Harry Crumb?
summary_text: Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.

name: A Better Life
summary_text: A gardener in East L.A. struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while trying to give his son the opportunities he never had.

name: The Distinguished Gentleman
summary_text: A conman discovers during a "job" that US Congress is where the money is. "Name recognition" gets him elected. Will he develop a conscience?

name: Race 2
summary_text: Ranvir treads through the world of the Indian mafia in Turkey as he looks to avenge the death of his lover and partner in crime.

name: Dragonslayer
summary_text: A young wizarding apprentice is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom.

name: Mood Indigo
summary_text: Wealthy, inventive bachelor Colin endeavors to find a cure for his lover Chloe after she's diagnosed with an unusual illness caused by a flower growing in her lungs.

name: Bottle Shock
summary_text: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris".

name: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
summary_text: Turning her back on her wealthy, established family, Diane Arbus falls in love with Lionel Sweeney, an enigmatic mentor who introduces Arbus to the marginalized people who help her become one of the most revered photographers of the twentieth century.

name: Lemonade Mouth
summary_text: Five high school kids, Olivia, Wendall, Stella, Charlie, and Mo, meet in detention and start a band based on the lemonade vending machine outside the detention room.

name: Thunder Road
summary_text: A police officer faces a personal meltdown following a divorce and the death of his mother.

name: Ivan Vasilievich: Back to the Future
summary_text: An ordinary Soviet building manager, living in the 20th century, is extremely similar to Tsar of All Rus' - Ivan IV the Terrible (1530 - 1584). He would never have known about this, but one day his neighbor created a time machine.

name: Run Hide Fight
summary_text: 17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.

name: Quest for Camelot
summary_text: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

name: Samba
summary_text: Senegalese Samba has worked 10 years in France. He's arrested and befriends the woman helping him with legal matters as volunteer after a burnout at work. He's released after being told to leave France. Chemistry?

name: Infinitely Polar Bear
summary_text: A father struggling with bipolar disorder tries to win back his wife by attempting to take full responsibility of their two young, spirited daughters, who don't make the overwhelming task any easier.

name: The Bishop's Wife
summary_text: A debonair angel comes to Earth to help an Episcopalian bishop and his wife in their quest to raise money for the new church.

name: A Coffee in Berlin
summary_text: An aimless university dropout attempts to make sense of life as he spends one fateful day wandering the streets of Berlin.

name: Hands of Stone
summary_text: The legendary Roberto Duran and his equally legendary trainer Ray Arcel change each other's lives.

name: Blind Fury
summary_text: A blind Vietnam vet, trained as a swordfighter, comes to America and helps to rescue the son of a fellow soldier.

name: Sword of the Stranger
summary_text: A swordsman from a strange land is caught in a struggle between morality, righteousness, and devotion as he reluctantly agrees to take a raggedy boy and his dog to a remote, Buddhist temple.

name: Intermission
summary_text: A variety of losers in Dublin have harrowingly farcical intersecting stories of love, greed and violence.

name: Nattevagten
summary_text: A law student starts working as nightwatchman at Department of Forensic Medicine in Copenhagen. His mad friend gets him on a game of dare that escalates. As a serial-killer's victims start piling up at work, he becomes a suspect.

name: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
summary_text: Four runaway crooks take shelter in a bungalow which is owned by a blind couple.

name: King Ralph
summary_text: A regular guy from America becomes king of England after a royal wipe-out puts him next in line.

name: Baghban
summary_text: An elderly couple wish their children to care for them in their old age. But their children see and treat them as a burden, and they must struggle to regain their worth and dignity to themselves and others.

name: Parkland
summary_text: A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.

name: Collide
summary_text: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Cologne high-speed Autobahn.

name: Europa Europa
summary_text: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

name: Children of a Lesser God
summary_text: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

name: Sabotage
summary_text: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.

name: The Company of Wolves
summary_text: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves prowling the woods below her bedroom window.

name: Bijitâ Q
summary_text: A troubled and perverted family find their lives intruded by a mysterious stranger who seems to help find a balance in their disturbing natures.

name: The Jungle Book 2
summary_text: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

name: Horse Girl
summary_text: Sarah, a socially isolated woman with a fondness for arts and crafts, horses, and supernatural crime shows finds her increasingly lucid dreams trickling into her waking life.

name: V/H/S Viral
summary_text: A Los Angeles police chase sends a fame-obsessed man on a wild ride to save his girlfriend from a cybernetic terror.

name: Niagara
summary_text: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

name: Party Monster
summary_text: Based on the true story of Michael Alig, a Club Kid party organizer whose life was sent spiraling down when he bragged on television about killing his drug dealer and roommate.

name: The Castle
summary_text: A working-class family from Melbourne, Australia fights city hall after being told they must vacate their beloved family home to allow for infrastructural expansion.

name: Kin
summary_text: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, an ex-con and his adopted teenage brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

name: New Kids Turbo
summary_text: Five friends from 'Maaskantje' are getting fired because of the economic crisis. They decide that they won't pay for anything anymore.

name: Summer Catch
summary_text: A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player.

name: Wedding Daze
summary_text: A guy proposes to his girlfriend, who drops dead. His BFF tries to get him to date other women but he only talks about his dead big love. At a diner he proposes to a cute waitress just to get his BFF off his back. She says yes.

name: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
summary_text: A young man searches for home in the changing city that seems to have left him behind.

name: Telling Tales
summary_text: The story of a minibus driver and a fairytale princesss nestling under the wing of timeless friendship in an ordinary neighborhood.

name: An Ideal Husband
summary_text: London 1895: Cabinet minister, Sir Chiltern, and bachelor, Lord Goring, are victims of scheming women.

name: The Knight Before Christmas
summary_text: A medieval English knight is magically transported to present-day America where he falls for a high school science teacher who is disillusioned by love.

name: Ready
summary_text: Set in Thailand and India, a case of mistaken identity leads to love; and a man and his family concoct a grand scheme to win over the hearts of a woman and her greedy conniving uncles.

name: Misconduct
summary_text: When an ambitious young lawyer takes on a big case against a powerful and ruthless executive of a large pharmaceutical company, he soon finds himself involved in a case of blackmail and corruption.

name: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
summary_text: A rich man catches a thief burglarizing his home and steals the thief's lucky ring, who then tries to get it back.

name: Are You Here
summary_text: Two childhood best friends, one a superficial womanizer and the other a barely functioning bipolar, embark on a road trip back to their hometown after one of them learns his estranged father has died.

name: Resolution
summary_text: A man imprisons his estranged junkie friend in an isolated cabin in the boonies of San Diego to force him through a week of sobriety, but the events of that week are being mysteriously manipulated.

name: Kirk Cameron's Saving Christmas
summary_text: His annual Christmas party faltering thanks to his cynical brother-in-law, former Growing Pains star Kirk Cameron attempts to save the day by showing him that Jesus Christ remains a crucial component of the over-commercialized holiday..

name: The Door in the Floor
summary_text: A writer's young assistant becomes both pawn and catalyst in his boss's disintegrating household.

name: Jakob the Liar
summary_text: During World War II, an ordinary inhabitant of a ghetto fakes news about Allied offensives to inspire hope for other victims of the Nazi regime.

name: The Wraith
summary_text: After a young man is murdered by a road-racing gang of motor-heads, a mysterious fast-driving spirit descends from the sky to take revenge.

name: City of Men
summary_text: Best buddies Acerola and Laranjinha, about to turn 18, discover things about their missing fathers' pasts which will shatter their solid friendship, in the middle of a war between rival drug gangs from Rio's favelas.

name: The Insult
summary_text: After an emotional exchange between a Lebanese Christian and a Palestinian refugee escalates, the men end up in a court case that gets national attention.

name: Mrs. Henderson Presents
summary_text: Laura Henderson (Dame Judi Dench) buys an old London theater and opens it up as the Windmill, a performance hall which goes down in history for, amongst other things, its all-nude revues.

name: Sandy Wexler
summary_text: Sandy Wexler is a talent manager working in Los Angeles in the 1990s, diligently representing a group of eccentric clients on the fringes of show business.

name: Shocker
summary_text: After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

name: Forever My Girl
summary_text: After being gone for a decade a country star returns home to the love he left behind.

name: Dying Young
summary_text: A nurse falls in love with a terminally ill man.

name: Blue Jay
summary_text: Meeting by chance when they return to their tiny California hometown, two former high-school sweethearts reflect on their shared past.

name: Mutiny on the Bounty
summary_text: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by officer Fletcher Christian.

name: Raat Akeli Hai
summary_text: The film follows a small town cop who is summoned to investigate the death of a politician which gets complicated by the victim's secretive family and his own conflicted heart.

name: La horde
summary_text: An end of the world battle between gangsters, cops and zombies.

name: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
summary_text: A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.

name: Kibar Feyzo
summary_text: A feudal village in Southeastern Turkey in 1970's. A poor peasant, Feyzo returns from military service dreaming about getting married to Gülo, the love of his life. However, he has to face ...                See full summary »

name: Café de Flore
summary_text: A love story between a man and woman. And between a mother and her son. A mystical and fantastical odyssey on love.

name: Evil Under the Sun
summary_text: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

name: Freejack
summary_text: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

name: A Dark Song
summary_text: A determined young woman and a damaged occultist risk their lives and souls to perform a dangerous ritual that will grant them what they want.

name: I.T.
summary_text: A millionaire has his life turned upside down after firing his I.T. consultant.

name: Maniac
summary_text: A psychotic man, troubled by his childhood abuse, loose in New York City, kills young women and takes their scalps as his trophies. Will he find the perfect woman in a photographer, and end his killing spree?

name: Fellini Satyricon
summary_text: A series of disjointed mythical tales set in first century Rome.

name: Flight 7500
summary_text: Flight 7500 departs Los Angeles International Airport bound for Tokyo. As the overnight flight makes its way over the Pacific Ocean during its ten-hour course, the passengers encounter what appears to be a supernatural force in the cabin.

name: Reversal of Fortune
summary_text: Wealthy Sunny von Bülow lies brain-dead, husband Claus guilty of attempted murder; but he says he's innocent and hires Alan Dershowitz for his appeal.

name: The Human Centipede III (Final Sequence)
summary_text: Taking inspiration from The Human Centipede films, the warden of a notorious and troubled prison looks to create a 500-person human centipede as a solution to his problems.

name: The Entity
summary_text: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

name: Cannonball Run II
summary_text: The original characters from The Cannonball Run (1981) race across the country once more in various cars and trucks.

name: Anniyan
summary_text: Ramanujam, who suffers from multiple personality disorder, works as a lawyer by day and a vigilante at night. He uses tips from the 'Garuda Purana' as his tools to expose various antisocial elements.

name: Hangman
summary_text: A homicide detective brings his partner out of retirement to help catch a serial killer whose crimes are based on the children's game Hangman.

name: Battle of the Bulge
summary_text: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.

name: Khakee
summary_text: A team of police force escorts an alleged terrorist from Chandangarh to Mumbai. However their trip turns into a deadly survival when an ex-cop tries to stop them to reach Mumbai.

name: The Trip to Italy
summary_text: Two men, six meals in six different places on a road trip around Italy. Liguria, Tuscany, Rome, Amalfi and ending in Capri.

name: Love Aaj Kal
summary_text: An old-fashioned romantic tells his personal love story to a modern man who has just broken up with his girlfriend. Has love really ever changed?

name: Unlawful Entry
summary_text: A burglar holds a knife to Karen's throat while her husband does nothing. The couple ends befriending the cop that comes. The friendship ends when the cop beats up the culprit. Karen isn't ready to end it. Things get ugly with the cop.

name: Kesari
summary_text: Based on an incredible true story of the Battle of Saragarhi in which an army of 21 Sikhs fought against 10,000 Afghans in 1897.

name: North Face
summary_text: A secretary at a Berlin newspaper in 1936 gets to write about two alpinists as she knows them well. She later gets to report on/photograph her friends' and other alpinists' climb of the dangerous Swiss Eiger north face.

name: Lord of Illusions
summary_text: A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captive the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.

name: Simmba
summary_text: Simmba, a Corrupt Officer, enjoys all the perks of being an immoral and unethical police officer until a life-changing event forces him to choose the righteous path.

name: The Best Man Holiday
summary_text: When college friends reunite after 15 years over the Christmas holidays, they discover just how easy it is for long-forgotten rivalries and romances to be reignited.

name: Lepa sela lepo gore
summary_text: During the war in Bosnia, two childhood friends eventually become enemies, as the tragic and devastating circumstances of the war put them on the opposite sides and expose the most gruesome and cruel aspects of the human nature.

name: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
summary_text: The story of a young revolutionary who raised an armed resistance against the British rule in India.

name: Imitation of Life
summary_text: An aspiring white actress takes in an African-American widow whose mixed-race daughter is desperate to be seen as white.

name: Holiday
summary_text: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

name: Final Girl
summary_text: A man teaches a young woman how to become a complete weapon. Later she is approached by a group of sadistic teens who kill blonde women for unknown reasons. The hunting season begins.

name: Vampire's Kiss
summary_text: After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.

name: Uncle Frank
summary_text: In 1973, when Frank Bledsoe and his 18-year-old niece Beth take a road trip from Manhattan to Creekville, South Carolina, for the family patriarch's funeral, they're unexpectedly joined by Frank's lover, Walid.

name: Selvi Boylum Al Yazmalim
summary_text: Story of a dilemma between a woman's love and her logic. Asya, a young girl with a strict mother, meets Ilyas who is a womanizer city man, and they quickly fall in love. They get over the ...                See full summary »

name: Gentleman's Agreement
summary_text: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

name: Ashby
summary_text: High-school student Ed Wallis enters into a friendship with his neighbor, Ashby, a retired CIA assassin who only has a few months left to live.

name: The Darkness
summary_text: A family unknowingly awakens an ancient supernatural entity on a Grand Canyon vacation, and must fight for survival when it follows them home.

name: Good Newwz
summary_text: Two couples with the same surnames pursue in-vitro fertilization and wait for their upcoming babies. Trouble ensues when they find that the sperms of each couple have been mixed with each other.

name: The Kid Who Would Be King
summary_text: A band of kids embark on an epic quest to thwart a medieval menace.

name: Recep Ivedik 5
summary_text: Recep continues his adventure with international athletic games.

name: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
summary_text: The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.

name: The Deep Blue Sea
summary_text: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.

name: Late Spring
summary_text: Noriko is twenty-seven years old and still living with her widowed father. Everybody tries to talk her into marrying, but Noriko wants to stay at home caring for her father.

name: Detention
summary_text: As a copycat killer named after movie villain Cinderhella stalks the student body at Grizzly Lake High School, a group of co-eds band together to survive while serving detention.

name: D.E.B.S.
summary_text: Plaid-skirted schoolgirls are groomed by a secret government agency to become the newest members of the elite national-defense group, D.E.B.S.

name: The Accidental Tourist
summary_text: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

name: Orlando
summary_text: After Queen Elizabeth I commands him not to grow old, a young nobleman struggles with love and his place in the world.

name: Scarlet Street
summary_text: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

name: The Brass Teapot
summary_text: When a couple discovers that a brass teapot makes them money whenever they hurt themselves, they must come to terms with how far they are willing to go.

name: The Man with One Red Shoe
summary_text: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.

name: Son of the Bride
summary_text: A dissatisfied 40-year-old, separated and without time for his own daughter and girlfriend must rethink his life when his father decides to marry his mother, who suffers from Alzheimer's disease, by church.

name: Of Gods and Men
summary_text: Under threat by fundamentalist terrorists, a group of Trappist monks stationed with an impoverished Algerian community must decide whether to leave or stay.

name: Monos
summary_text: On a remote mountaintop, eight kids with guns watch over a hostage and a conscripted milk cow.

name: A United Kingdom
summary_text: The story of King Seretse Khama of Botswana and how his loving but controversial marriage to a British white woman, Ruth Williams, put his kingdom into political and diplomatic turmoil.

name: Edison
summary_text: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.

name: Smokey and the Bandit II
summary_text: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.

name: The Personal History of David Copperfield
summary_text: A modern take on Charles Dickens's classic tale of a young orphan who is able to triumph over many obstacles.

name: Columbus
summary_text: A Korean-born man finds himself stuck in Columbus, Indiana, where his architect father is in a coma. The man meets a young woman who wants to stay in Columbus with her mother, a recovering addict, instead of pursuing her own dreams.

name: Blue Mountain State: The Rise of Thadland
summary_text: When the Dean of Blue Mountain State threatens to sell the Goat House, Alex throws Thad the party of his dreams in an effort to get him to buy it.

name: The Russia House
summary_text: An expatriate British publisher unexpectedly finds himself working for British intelligence to investigate people in Russia.

name: Zabriskie Point
summary_text: At a time of chronic civil unrest in the USA at Zabriskie Point, in Death Valley, CA, two perfect strangers meet; a young revolutionary and an anthropology student who start an unrestrained romance, making love on the dusty terrain.

name: Girl Most Likely
summary_text: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.

name: The Children's Hour
summary_text: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.

name: April Fool's Day
summary_text: Nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's Day weekend, but nothing is as it seems.

name: Brexit
summary_text: Political strategist Dominic Cummings leads a popular but controversial campaign to convince British voters to leave the European Union from 2015 up until the present day.

name: Lenny
summary_text: The story of acerbic 1960s comic Lenny Bruce, whose groundbreaking, no-holds-barred style and social commentary was often deemed by the Establishment as too obscene for the public.

name: Prom
summary_text: A group of teenagers get ready for their high school prom.

name: Berberian Sound Studio
summary_text: A sound engineer's work for an Italian horror studio becomes a terrifying case of life imitating art.

name: Shadow in the Cloud
summary_text: A female WWII pilot traveling with top secret documents on a B-17 Flying Fortress encounters an evil presence on board the flight.

name: Night Moves
summary_text: Three radical environmentalists look to execute the protest of their lives: the explosion of a hydroelectric dam.

name: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
summary_text: A boy's life is turned upside down when he learns that he is the last of a group of immortal warriors who have dedicated their lives to fighting the forces of the dark.

name: Page Eight
summary_text: Johnny works for MI5. His neighbor Nancy approaches him. When his best friend and boss suddenly dies, Johnny's left to sort out things about the PM, MI5 and US.

name: The Wild One
summary_text: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

name: The Train
summary_text: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

name: The Oogieloves in the Big Balloon Adventure
summary_text: The Oogieloves, Goobie, Zoozie, and Toofie, set out to find five magical balloons that will make their good friend Schluufy's surprise birthday party extra special.

name: The Silencing
summary_text: A reformed hunter living in isolation on a wildlife sanctuary becomes involved in a deadly game of cat and mouse when he and the local Sheriff set out to track a vicious killer who may have kidnapped his daughter years ago.

name: Fathers' Day
summary_text: A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father.

name: Luther
summary_text: During the early sixteenth century, idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the Catholic Church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.

name: Grand Canyon
summary_text: The fates of several people are intertwining randomly. Their sympathy of each other faces multiple differences in their lifestyles.

name: Dangerous Lies
summary_text: When a wealthy elderly man dies and unexpectedly leaves his estate to his new caregiver, she's drawn into a web of deception and murder. If she's going to survive, she'll have to question everyone's motives - even the people she loves.

name: Lucas
summary_text: A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.

name: Wilde
summary_text: The turmoil in poet/playwright Oscar Wilde's life after he discovers his homosexuality.

name: The Sons of Katie Elder
summary_text: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

name: Soapdish
summary_text: An ambitious television soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.

name: Extraterrestrial
summary_text: A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.

name: Staying Alive
summary_text: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

name: Sansho the Bailiff
summary_text: In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.

name: The Guru
summary_text: A young man leaves India to find fame and fortune in America where he unexpectedly becomes a sex guru.

name: Grandma
summary_text: A teenager facing an unplanned pregnancy seeks help from her acerbic grandmother, a woman who is long estranged from her daughter.

name: Kolya
summary_text: A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires and leaves him with a pint-sized new roommate.

name: Death Wish II
summary_text: Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

name: Vizontele Tuuba
summary_text: Vizontele Tuuba is the sequel to Vizontele and recounts the 1980 military coup, the repercussions of the coup in a small southeastern town in Turkey. This is a very confusing period: every ...                See full summary »

name: About Last Night
summary_text: A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.

name: Momentum
summary_text: 4 criminals steal diamonds from a safe deposit box in Cape Town - including a drive containing a US senator's evil plans. He'll do anything to get it back from Alexis/Olga Kurylenko.

name: The Night Listener
summary_text: In the midst of his crumbling relationship, a radio show host begins speaking to his biggest fan, a young boy, via the telephone. But when questions about the boy's identity come up, the host's life is thrown into chaos.

name: Terrifier
summary_text: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

name: Half Past Dead
summary_text: This movie tells the story of a man who goes undercover in a hi-tech prison to find out information to help prosecute those who killed his wife. While there he stumbles onto a plot involving a death-row inmate and his $200 million stash of gold.

name: Lootera
summary_text: An aristocrat's daughter falls in love with a visiting archaeologist, but he holds a secret that could drive them apart.

name: Gridlock'd
summary_text: Two friends try to kick their drug addiction after a friend dies from an overdose, when they try to enroll in a detox program, things quickly go wrong.

name: The Driver
summary_text: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

name: Caddyshack II
summary_text: When a crass new-money tycoon's membership application is turned down at a snooty country club, he retaliates by buying the club and turning it into a tacky amusement park.

name: CJ7
summary_text: A poor Chinese laborer learns important lessons after his son gets a strange new toy.

name: 200 Cigarettes
summary_text: A collection of twentysomethings try to cope with relationships, loneliness, desire and their individual neuroses.

name: Sukiyaki Western Django
summary_text: A nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.

name: L'Atalante
summary_text: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

name: Head in the Clouds
summary_text: From the roaring 1920s to the ruinous Spanish Civil War and Adolf Hitler's rise into power, the lives of an Irish schoolteacher, a provocative heiress and her Spanish muse are intricately interlaced, sharing the same destiny and passion.

name: Dylan Dog: Dead of Night
summary_text: The adventures of supernatural private investigator, Dylan Dog, who seeks out the monsters of the Louisiana bayou in his signature red shirt, black jacket, and blue jeans.

name: The Package
summary_text: When a group of teenage friends go on a spring break camping trip, an unfortunate accident sets off a race against time to save their friend's most prized possession.

name: Maratonci trce pocasni krug
summary_text: The Topalovic family has been in the burial business for generations. When the old (150 yrs old) Pantelija dies, five generations of his heirs start to fight for the inheritance.

name: Eye of the Beholder
summary_text: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

name: Rio Grande
summary_text: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is confronted with murderous raiding Apaches, a son who's a risk-taking recruit and his wife from whom he has been separated for many years.

name: Dheepan
summary_text: Dheepan is a Sri Lankan Tamil warrior who flees to France and ends up working as a caretaker outside Paris.

name: Newness
summary_text: In contemporary Los Angeles, two millennials navigating a social media-driven hookup culture begin a relationship that pushes both emotional and physical boundaries.

name: Mafia!
summary_text: Takeoff on the Godfather with the son of a mafia king taking over for his dying father

name: Before the Fall
summary_text: Friedrich's boxing skills gets him in an elite Nazi high school in a castle in 1942. He enrolls against his dad's wish as it promises a brighter future. It's not what he expected.

name: Trinity Is Still My Name
summary_text: Bambino tries to teach his brother Trinity how to become an outlaw, but the two wind up saving a pioneer family and breaking up an arms ring instead.

name: The Day After
summary_text: The effects of a devastating nuclear holocaust on small-town residents of eastern Kansas.

name: Come to Daddy
summary_text: A man in his thirties travels to a remote cabin to reconnect with his estranged father.

name: Thappad
summary_text: Thappad is a story of Amrita whose seemingly perfect life is shattered when her husband slaps her once in a party. But is one slap enough to question what a relationship stands for?

name: I Can Only Imagine
summary_text: The inspiring and unknown true story behind MercyMe's beloved, chart topping song that brings ultimate hope to so many is a gripping reminder of the power of true forgiveness.

name: The Man with the Iron Heart
summary_text: As the German Fascists expand their borders, scorching Europe from end to end, two brave Czechs of the Resistance prepare for a suicide mission to assassinate Reinhard Heydrich, the hideous mastermind behind the "Final Solution".

name: The Love Bug
summary_text: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.

name: Five Minarets in New York
summary_text: After an unsuccessful and bloody raid in Istanbul, two Turkish anti-terrorist agents are sent to New York City on a mission to capture a notorious terrorist known only as "Dejjal" (Arabic for Anti-Christ).

name: Tubelight
summary_text: A story of two brothers set during the Sino-Indian war, 1962: the younger one who's at war at the borders and the elder who's at war with his own world.

name: Little Big Soldier
summary_text: An old soldier kidnaps a young General of an enemy state and takes him on a long journey to collect the reward.

name: Vehicle 19
summary_text: In Johannesburg, an American parole breaker unknowingly picks up a rental car that will tie him to a web of corrupt local police.

name: Mommie Dearest
summary_text: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

name: Made in Dagenham
summary_text: A dramatization of the 1968 strike at the Ford Dagenham car plant, where female workers walked out in protest against sexual discrimination.

name: Company
summary_text: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

name: The Phantom of Liberty
summary_text: A series of surreal sequences that critique morality and society in a stream of consciousness style.

name: My Beautiful Laundrette
summary_text: An ambitious Pakistani Briton and his white boyfriend strive for success and hope when they open a glamorous laundromat.

name: Crossroads
summary_text: A wanna be blues guitar virtuoso seeks a long lost song by legendary musician, Robert Johnson.

name: Two Brothers
summary_text: Two tigers are separated as cubs and taken into captivity, only to be reunited years later as enemies by an explorer who inadvertently forces them to fight each other.

name: Next Gen
summary_text: A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.

name: Maniac Cop
summary_text: A killer dressed in a police uniform begins murdering innocent people on the streets of New York City.

name: Paparazzi
summary_text: A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.

name: Chalte Chalte
summary_text: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.

name: Hell Fest
summary_text: A masked serial killer turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.
